scripts.test: npm build && concurrently --kill-others --success first "hugo server" "blc http://localhost:1313 -ro"
scripts.watch:css: npm run compile:css && inotifywait -m -r -e modify,create,delete ./src/scss/ | while read NEWFILE; do npm run compile:css; done
scripts.watch:offers: npm run compile:offers && inotifywait -m -r -e modify,create,delete ./src/offers/ | while read NEWFILE; do npm run compile:offers; done
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run watch:offers" "hugo server --log --bind=0.0.0.0" "xdg-open http://localhost:1313/"
scripts.build: npm run compile:css && npm run compile:offers && hugo
